metadata.feature_description: Tests the Save button element in the UI (currently non-functional placeholder)

steps.action: Logged into the application as SuperUser (host)
steps.actual: Login successful, PersonaBar displayed with nav_Accounts menu item visible

steps.action: Clicked on the Accounts menu item (Evoq.Accounts) in the PersonaBar
steps.expected: AccountSettings panel should open displaying the Save button
steps.actual: The Accounts menu item has an empty data-path attribute and clicking it does not open any panel. The Site Settings panel remained open instead.

steps.action: Verified that the AccountSettings HTML content was not loaded in the DOM
steps.expected: AccountSettings content with Save button should be rendered
steps.actual: The AccountSettings HTML content (including 'Hello World' text and Save button) is not present in the DOM. The module's panel path is not properly configured.

issues: The AccountSettings module menu item (Evoq.Accounts) has an empty data-path attribute, causing the panel to never load
Clicking on the Accounts menu item does not trigger any panel navigation - it appears to be a non-functional menu entry
The Save button cannot be verified as visible because the AccountSettings panel does not render

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Check Save button has 'primarybtn' CSS class

steps.action: Attempted to access the AccountSettings panel to inspect the Save button CSS class
steps.expected: AccountSettings panel loads and Save button with 'primarybtn' class is present
steps.actual: Cannot verify CSS class - the AccountSettings panel does not load due to empty data-path configuration

issues: Unable to verify Save button CSS class because the AccountSettings panel content is not rendered

steps.action: Attempted to access the AccountSettings panel to test Save button click event
steps.expected: AccountSettings panel loads and Save button is clickable
steps.actual: Cannot test click event - the AccountSettings panel does not load due to empty data-path configuration

issues: Unable to test Save button click event because the AccountSettings panel content is not rendered

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify button is accessible via keyboard navigation

steps.action: Attempted to access the AccountSettings panel to test keyboard accessibility
steps.expected: AccountSettings panel loads and Save button is keyboard accessible
steps.actual: Cannot test keyboard navigation - the AccountSettings panel does not load due to empty data-path configuration

issues: Unable to test keyboard accessibility because the AccountSettings panel content is not rendered

observations: The AccountSettings module is registered in the PersonaBar menu with ID 'Evoq.Accounts' and module name 'Accounts'
The menu item displays 'nav_Accounts' instead of localized text 'Accounts', indicating a possible localization issue
The AccountSettings menu item has an empty data-path attribute (data-path=''), while working menu items like SiteSettings have a valid path (e.g., data-path='EvoqSiteSettings')
Analysis of other working PersonaBar modules shows they have proper data-path values that route to their panel content
The AccountSettings HTML file (admin/personaBar/AccountSettings.html) is described as containing 'Hello World, This is Site Settings.' and a Save button, but this content is never loaded into the DOM
This appears to be a module configuration or installation issue rather than a code defect in the Save button itself
The Save button functionality cannot be tested via UI until the AccountSettings module panel routing is properly configured
